name: Focus, Francis!
description:
⭐️ Sometimes its hard to focus on things!⭐️
⭐️ Help Francis focus on various tasks while shooting down distractions. ⭐️

📝 HOW TO PLAY
• Hover your cursor over the current task to focus on it. 
• Clear enough tasks and you’ll rank up!
• Ranking up opens up new perks for Francis to benefit from. 
• Use the left mouse button or (S) to shoot down distractions.
• Distractions and failing to focus on a task in time will hurt Francis.
• Keep Francis’s health up and get as high a score as you can!

🕹 CONTROLS
• Mouse to move cursor and aim
• Left Mouse button, S, or L to shoot
• P to Pause (or select Pause button in bottom left)

🚧 DEVELOPMENT
This is a tiny game made over the course of about 2 months. 
I'll be occasionally making additional updates here and there until 1.0!
Lots of ideas to explore if I ever pick it back up again down the road after that.
